citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
October 22, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the door and speaking with
an employee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on 
October 22, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the door and speaking with 
an employee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA 
and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
